Title: AGS Website
Description: AGS is a school located in UAE, the purpose of this website is to provide information about the school and to provide a platform for students to access their online learning materials

Title: Hello Voice CMS
Description: Hellovoice is a content management system that allows users to create, edit and delete articles. The CMS also allows users to create and manage categories and tags

Title: Event CMS
Description: content management For event system that allows users to create, edit and delete articles. The CMS also allows users to create and manage categories and tags
